title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.5 - Definition of trout waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 180.5 - Definition of trout waters

State Regulations

For the purposes of the Fish and Wildlife Law and this

Title, the terms trout waters, trout streams, trout ponds and trout lakes shall
mean those waters, streams, ponds and lakes inhabited (as defined by section
11-0103
of the Environmental

Conservation Law) by trout. Waters, streams, ponds and lakes listed in

Subchapter B of Chapter X of this Title for which a standard (T) or (Ts) is
designated are trout waters for the purposes of the Fish and Wildlife

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
180.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
